# Weak

ore cinnabar
oreDict oreCinnabar
tileType stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/cinnabar
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/weak/cinnabar normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Cinnabar (Mercury Ore)

ore galena
oreDict oreLead
tileType stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/galena
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/weak/galena normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Galena (Lead Ore)

# This was referred to oreMolydenum in the original PFAA COG XML
ore molybdenite
oreDict oreMolybdenum
tileType stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/molybdenite
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/weak/molybdenite normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Molybdenite (Molybdenum Ore)

lang.en Pyrolusite (Manganese Ore)

# Medium

ore barite
oreDict oreBarium
tileType stone
hardness 3.0

oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/medium/barite normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Barite (Barium Ore)

# This one is tricky. Mindat says "Most samples are Ni-dominant, but some are Fe-dominant".
ore pentlandite
oreDict oreNickel
tileType stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/pentlandite
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/medium/pentlandite normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Pentlandite (Nickle Ore)

ore scheelite
oreDict oreTungsten
tileType stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/scheelite
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/medium/scheelite normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Scheelite (Tungsten Ore)

ore sphalerite
oreDict oreZinc
tileType stone
hardness 3.0

oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/medium/sphalerite normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Sphalerite (Zinc Ore)

ore wolframite
oreDict oreTungsten
tileType stone
hardness 3.0

lang.en Wolframite (Tungsten Ore)

# Regardless of IUPAC naming, oreBauxite came first
ore alunite
oreDict oreBauxite
tileType stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/alunite
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/medium/alunite normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Alunite (Aluminium Ore)
lang.en_us Alunite (Aluminum Ore)

ore celestine

hardness 3.0

oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/medium/celestine normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Celestine (Strontium Ore)

# Strong

ore banded_iron
oreDict oreIron
tileType stone
hardness 4.0
convertsTo minecraft:iron_ore
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/banded_iron
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/strong/banded_iron normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
textureCaps strata:blocks/ore/strong/banded_iron_caps
blockState strata:proto_cube_y_overlay
lang.en Banded Iron (Iron Ore)

ore cassiterite
oreDict oreTin

hardness 4.0

lang.en Cassiterite (Tin Ore)

# Caesium is the IUPAC name. Beware of oreCesium.
ore pollucite
oreDict oreCaesium
tileType stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/pollucite
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/strong/pollucite normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Pollucite (Caesium Ore)
lang.en_us Pollucite (Cesium Ore)

# Crude

ore bituminous_coal
oreDict oreCoal bituminousCoal
tileType stone
hardness 3.0
convertsTo minecraft:coal
burnTime 1600
texture strata:blocks/ore/crude/bituminous_coal
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/crude/bituminous_coal normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Bituminous Coal

ore lignite
oreDict oreCoal lignite
tileType stone
hardness 3.0
convertsTo minecraft:coal
burnTime 1600
texture strata:blocks/ore/crude/lignite
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/crude/lignite normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Lignite

ore anthracite
oreDict oreCoal anthracite
tileType stone
hardness 3.0
convertsTo minecraft:coal
burnTime 1600
texture strata:blocks/ore/crude/anthracite
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/crude/anthracite normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Anthracite

ore coke
oreDict oreCoal coke

hardness 3.0
convertsTo minecraft:coal
burnTime 1600

lang.en Coke

# Clay

ore bauxite
oreDict oreBauxite
tileType clay
hardness 1.5
texture strata:blocks/ore/clay/bauxite
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/clay/bauxite normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Bauxite (Aluminium Ore)
lang.en_us Bauxite (Aluminum Ore)

ore brown_limonite
oreDict oreIron
tileType clay
hardness 1.5
convertsTo minecraft:iron_ore
texture strata:blocks/ore/clay/brown_limonite
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/clay/brown_limonite normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Brown Limonite (Iron Ore)

ore yellow_limonite
oreDict oreIron
tileType clay
hardness 1.5
convertsTo minecraft:iron_ore
texture strata:blocks/ore/clay/yellow_limonite
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/clay/yellow_limonite normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
lang.en Yellow Limonite (Iron Ore)
